Structs/BKYLayoutConfigUnit.html#/c:@S@B.name: workspaceUnit
Structs/BKYLayoutConfigUnit.html#/c:@S@B.abstract: The unit value specified in the Workspace coordinate system

Structs/BKYLayoutConfigUnit.html#/c:@S@B.name: viewUnit
Structs/BKYLayoutConfigUnit.html#/c:@S@B.abstract: The unit value specified in the UIView coordinate system. This value is automatically derived

Structs/BKYLayoutConfigSize.html#/c:@S@B.name: workspaceSize
Structs/BKYLayoutConfigSize.html#/c:@S@B.abstract: The size value specified in the Workspace coordinate system

Structs/BKYLayoutConfigSize.html#/c:@S@B.name: viewSize
Structs/BKYLayoutConfigSize.html#/c:@S@B.abstract: The size value specified in the UIView coordinate system. This value is automatically derived

Structs/BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsets.html#/.name: workspaceEdgeInsets
Structs/BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsets.html#/.abstract: The size value specified in the Workspace coordinate system

Structs/BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsets.html#/.name: viewEdgeInsets
Structs/BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsets.html#/.abstract: The size value specified in the UIView coordinate system. This value is automatically derived

Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html#/c:@S@BKYEdge.name: top
Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html#/c:@S@BKYEdge.abstract: The inset distance for the top edge.

Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html#/c:@S@BKYEdge.name: leading
Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html#/c:@S@BKYEdge.abstract: The inset distance for the leading edge.

Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html#/c:@S@BKYEdge.name: bottom
Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html#/c:@S@BKYEdge.abstract: The inset distance for the bottom edge.

Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html#/c:@S@BKYEdge.name: trailing
Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html#/c:@S@BKYEdge.abstract: The inset distance for the trailing edge.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.name: BKYBlockJSONFileColorDefault
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.abstract: Option for specifying the file containing JSON definitions for default color blocks.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.name: BKYBlockJSONFileListDefault
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.abstract: Option for specifying the file containing JSON definitions for default list blocks.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.name: BKYBlockJSONFileLogicDefault
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.abstract: Option for specifying the file containing JSON definitions for default logic blocks.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.name: BKYBlockJSONFileLoopDefault
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.abstract: Option for specifying the file containing JSON definitions for default loop blocks.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.name: BKYBlockJSONFileMathDefault
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.abstract: Option for specifying the file containing JSON definitions for default math blocks.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.name: BKYBlockJSONFileProcedureDefault
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.abstract: Option for specifying the file containing JSON definitions for default procedure blocks.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.name: BKYBlockJSONFileTextDefault
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.abstract: Option for specifying the file containing JSON definitions for default text blocks.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.name: BKYBlockJSONFileVariableDefault
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.abstract: Option for specifying the file containing JSON definitions for default variable blocks.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.name: BKYBlockJSONFileAllDefault
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html#/c:@E@BKYBlo.abstract: Option for specifying files containing JSON definitions for all default blocks.

Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html.name: BKYBlockJSONFile
Enums/BKYBlockJSONFile.html.abstract: Options for specifying files that contain different types of JSON block definitions.

Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html.name: BKYEdgeInsets
Structs/BKYEdgeInsets.html.abstract: Defines inset distances for views/layouts, that allows for both LTR and RTL layouts.

iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYEdgeInsetsGetLeft.name: BKYEdgeInsetsGetLeft
iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYEdgeInsetsGetLeft.abstract: The inset distance for the left edge.

iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYEdgeInsetsGetRight.name: BKYEdgeInsetsGetRight
iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYEdgeInsetsGetRight.abstract: The inset distance for the right edge.

iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYEdgeInsetsMake.name: BKYEdgeInsetsMake
iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYEdgeInsetsMake.abstract: Creates edge insets, with given values for each edge.

iOS.html#/c:@BKYEdgeInsetsZero.name: BKYEdgeInsetsZero
iOS.html#/c:@BKYEdgeInsetsZero.abstract: Creates edge insets, with each inset value set to zero.

Structs/BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsets.html.name: BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsets
Structs/BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsets.html.abstract: Struct for representing an EdgeInsets value (i.e. width/height) in both the Workspace coordinate

iOS.html#/c:@BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsetsZe.name: BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsetsZero
iOS.html#/c:@BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsetsZe.abstract: Creates a BKYLayoutConfigEdgeInsets, where both workspace and view edge inset values are set to zero.

Structs/BKYLayoutConfigSize.html.name: BKYLayoutConfigSize
Structs/BKYLayoutConfigSize.html.abstract: Struct for representing a Size value (i.e. width/height) in both the Workspace coordinate

iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYLayoutConfigSizeMake.name: BKYLayoutConfigSizeMake
iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYLayoutConfigSizeMake.abstract: Creates a BKYLayoutConfigSize, initialized with a given workspace width/height to generate

Structs/BKYLayoutConfigUnit.html.name: BKYLayoutConfigUnit
Structs/BKYLayoutConfigUnit.html.abstract: Struct for representing a unit value in both the Workspace coordinate system and UIView

Structs/BKYWorkspacePoint.html.name: BKYWorkspacePoint
Structs/BKYWorkspacePoint.html.abstract: Point in the Workspace coordinate system (which is separate from the UIView coordinate system).

iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYWorkspacePointMake.name: BKYWorkspacePointMake
iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYWorkspacePointMake.abstract: Creates a point in the Workspace coordinate system, given (x, y) coordinates.

iOS.html#/c:@BKYWorkspacePointZero.name: BKYWorkspacePointZero
iOS.html#/c:@BKYWorkspacePointZero.abstract: A point in the Workspace coordinate system, where x and y coordinates are set to zero.

Structs/BKYWorkspaceSize.html.name: BKYWorkspaceSize
Structs/BKYWorkspaceSize.html.abstract: Size in the Workspace coordinate system (which is separate from the UIView coordinate system).

iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYWorkspaceSizeMake.name: BKYWorkspaceSizeMake
iOS.html#/c:@F@BKYWorkspaceSizeMake.abstract: Creates a size in the Workspace coordinate system, given width and height values.

iOS.html#/c:@BKYWorkspaceSizeZero.name: BKYWorkspaceSizeZero
iOS.html#/c:@BKYWorkspaceSizeZero.abstract: A size in the Workspace coordinate system, where width and height values are set to zero.
